body.p:
supports the editing of bidirectional (BiDi) documents with the following limitations:
Ligatures are broken when:
A part of a word is surrounded by an element. It works correctly in Chrome when the Tags Display Mode is No Tags.
A tag may point to an incorrect direction when rendering elements that contain both RTL (Right to Left) and LTR (Left to Right) content.
Tables are not resizable in RTL (Right to Left) documents.
